product_name: Canari Elite Bike Shorts - Men's - 2011/2012 Closeout
long_description: The men's Canari Elite Bike Shorts boast seamless inner thigh construction and a padded chamois for great comfort on long rides. Nylon/spandex blend quickly wicks away sweat, dries fast and stretches easily. 8-panel design creates an anatomic fit for excellent performance. Built-in, seamless molded chamois provides padded comfort for long stretches in the saddle. Silicone grippers at cuffs keep Canari Elite Bike Shorts from riding up. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Canari Elite Bike Shorts boast seamless inner thigh construction and a padded chamois for great comfort on long rides.
